DOC.brief_title: Anxiety With Cancer Elderly ( ACE ) : A Cognitive-behavioral Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: This study single arm pre-post evaluation six-session telephone-administered cognitive-behavioral therapy ( CBT ) intervention anxiety old adult cancer primary informal ( unpaid ) caregiver . The primary purpose study evaluate feasibility intervention study procedure , acceptability intervention old adult cancer primary informal caregiver , patient caregiver adherence intervention . The secondary purpose examine change patient caregiver anxiety , depression , distress , quality life pre post intervention determine whether intervention clinically significant impact outcome . Anxiety primary outcome ; depression , distress , quality life secondary outcome . Patients 65 year age older recruit myeloma , lung , lymphoma , gynecologic , gastrointestinal cancer clinic single institution . Study measure administer telephone prior initiate intervention ( pre-intervention ) follow intervention completion ( post-intervention ) .
